No More Ads or Clutter! üöÄ
Twifiner enhances your Twitter experience by removing ads, reducing clutter, and providing cool features like easier word muting, account age display, and more.

Changelog:

version 5:
You can now add notes to other users' profiles.
Tweets are now displayed using the Vazirmatn font (thanks to Saber Rasti Kardar, may he rest in peace).
Fixed an issue where the profile icon was being moved to the first position.
Some other minor bug fixes and improvements.

version 4:
Message requests are now highlighted on the Messages page for better visibility
Retweets are now hidden on user profiles, in addition to the timeline #9
Hiding the "Discover More" is now optional #5
Fixed a major issue causing incorrect display of some numbers in tweets #7
Fixed an issue that prevented notification count reset when the header was hidden #8
Removed the link replacement feature and extension disabling option for better performance and enable the removal of some unnecessary permissions
Removed a few permissions to address safety worries, at the value of losing some minor conveniences
some refactor and enhancements

version 3:
Added option for justifying tweet and chat messages
Fixed font issue by reverting tweet fonts to the default
Fixed issue with RTL alignment of Persian chat messages
Fixed issue with RTL alignment of Persian descriptions in images
Hide some new inline prompts, which appear in the timeline
Minor UI tweaks for better accessibility
Some fixes and improvements

version 2:
Fixed dark mode issues in navigation, pinned tweets, follow page, notifications, and hashtags
Added option to hide retweets
Added option to change font size
Restored default font for non-Persian tweets and Twitter UI
Highlighted mutual friendships on verified followers page
Made Persian tweet normalization optional
Made hashtag styling optional
Made ad display optional
Made title display instead of link optional
Made color of mutual friendships on follow page optional
Made color of pinned tweets optional
Made moving profile to top optional
Made highlighting reply notifications optional
Made advanced search link display optional
Some bug fixes and improvements
